We are not able to accept candidates who are currently on an OPT or STEM-OPT visa.<\u002Fi><\u002Fb><\u002Fp><br>\n<p><\u002Fp>\n<p>\nWe are seeking a strong Product Lead to drive the development of MYMOVEs AI powered moving application.<\u002Fp>\n<p>\nThe Product Lead will join the &quot;MyMove&quot; team within our Home division at Red Ventures. This role requires a hybrid schedule with 4 days in the office (Mon - Thu) and is based either in our New York or Charlotte office.<\u002Fp>\n<p><b>\nWhat Youll Do:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n<ul>\n<li>Work closely with senior leadership to develop the strategy for MYMOVE+, our AI powered moving application.<\u002Fli>\n<li>We need a product and business leader to create and drive the product roadmap; provide vision and direction for the growth of the product<\u002Fli>\n<li>Identify opportunities for new feature development and distribution, define and analyze KPIs to guide product development<\u002Fli>\n<li>Work with cross-functional teams and external partners to drive product innovation and financial results<\u002Fli>\n<li>Able to work in a fast paced environment, experience in 0-to-1 development, proven track record of iterating quickly<\u002Fli>\n<li>Develop and guide a culture of talent development through both direct management of a product analyst and indirect cross-functional partnership<\u002Fli>\n<\u002Ful>\n<p><b>What Were Looking For:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n<ul>\n<li>4-5 years of previous experience in a product management role (preferably working on app development) with 1-2 years experience bringing generative AI technology and products to market<\u002Fli>\n<li>Outstanding intellect, drive, and interpersonal skills and the desire to challenge the status quo<\u002Fli>\n<li>Track record of developing product strategies that consider business goals, consumer needs, feasibility, time to market, unit economics, ROI and competition<\u002Fli>\n<li>Proven proactive approach to product management, with strong follow-through, resourcefulness, attention to detail and excellent written and verbal communication skills<\u002Fli>\n<li>Ability to thrive in a demanding, fast-paced environment requiring a high degree of productivity, adaptability, innovation and follow-through<\u002Fli>\n<li>Demonstrated ability to influence cross-functional teams and guide them towards a unified product vision<\u002Fli>\n<li>Passionate about understanding customer behavior and enhancing the product experience.<\u002Fli>\n<li>Strong level of accountability and ability to communicate across functional teams to drive priorities, anticipate pitfalls, and raise issues before they become project blockers<\u002Fli>\n<li>Excellent organizational and communication skills.<\u002Fli>\n<\u002Ful>\n<p><b>Compensation<\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n<ul>\n<li>USA Compensation Range: 2000, Red Ventures (RV) is home to a diverse portfolio of industry-leading brands and businesses, strategic partnerships and proprietary technology &ndash; including Bankrate, Lonely Planet, CNET, The Points Guy, BestColleges and more. Together, RV helps millions of people worldwide make lifes most important decisions, accelerates digital adaptation, and innovates the online consumer experience by improving every step of the consumer journey &ndash; from first discovery of information, throughout the decision-making process, to transactions. Headquartered south of Charlotte, NC, Red Ventures employs thousands of people across the US and Puerto Rico, with international offices in the UK and Brazil. For more information, visit https:\u002F\u002Fredventures.com and follow @RedVentures on social platforms.<\u002Fp>\n<p>\nWe offer competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits program for full-time employees, including medical, dental and vision coverage, paid time off, life insurance, disability coverage, employee assistance program, 401(k) plan and a paid parental leave program.<\u002Fp>\n<p>\nRed Ventures is an equal opportunity employer that does not discriminate against any employee or applicant because of race, creed, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity\u002Fexpression, national origin, disability, age, genetic information, veteran status, marital status, pregnancy or any other basis protected by law. We are not able to accept candidates who are currently on an OPT or STEM-OPT visa.\n\nWe are seeking a strong Product Lead to drive the development of MYMOVEs AI powered moving application.\n\nThe Product Lead will join the \"MyMove\" team within our Home division at Red Ventures. This role requires a hybrid schedule with 4 days in the office (Mon - Thu) and is based either in our New York or Charlotte office.\n\nWhat Youll Do:\n\nWork closely with senior leadership to develop the strategy for MYMOVE+, our AI powered moving application.\nWe need a product and business leader to create and drive the product roadmap; provide vision and direction for the growth of the product\nIdentify opportunities for new feature development and distribution, define and analyze KPIs to guide product development\nWork with cross-functional teams and external partners to drive product innovation and financial results\nAble to work in a fast paced environment, experience in 0-to-1 development, proven track record of iterating quickly\nDevelop and guide a culture of talent development through both direct management of a product analyst and indirect cross-functional partnership\n\nWhat Were Looking For:\n\n4-5 years of previous experience in a product management role (preferably working on app development) with 1-2 years experience bringing generative AI technology and products to market\nOutstanding intellect, drive, and interpersonal skills and the desire to challenge the status quo\nTrack record of developing product strategies that consider business goals, consumer needs, feasibility, time to market, unit economics, ROI and competition\nProven proactive approach to product management, with strong follow-through, resourcefulness, attention to detail and excellent written and verbal communication skills\nAbility to thrive in a demanding, fast-paced environment requiring a high degree of productivity, adaptability, innovation and follow-through\nDemonstrated ability to influence cross-functional teams and guide them towards a unified product vision\nPassionate about understanding customer behavior and enhancing the product experience.\nStrong level of accountability and ability to communicate across functional teams to drive priorities, anticipate pitfalls, and raise issues before they become project blockers\nExcellent organizational and communication skills.\n\nCompensation\n\nUSA Compensation Range: $100,000-$130,000\n*Note actual salary is based on geographic location, qualifications, and experience.\n\nAdditionally, the following benefits are provided by Red Ventures, subject to eligibility requirements.\n\nHealth Insurance Coverage (medical, dental, and vision)\nLife Insurance\nShort and Long-Term Disability Insurance\nFlexible Spending Accounts\nPaid Time Off\nHoliday Pay\n401(k) with match\nEmployee Assistance Program\nPaid Parental Bonding Benefit Program\n\nWho We Are:\n\nFounded in 2000, Red Ventures (RV) is home to a diverse portfolio of industry-leading brands and businesses, strategic partnerships and proprietary technology  including Bankrate, Lonely Planet, CNET, The Points Guy, BestColleges and more. Together, RV helps millions of people worldwide make lifes most important decisions, accelerates digital adaptation, and innovates the online consumer experience by improving every step of the consumer journey  from first discovery of information, throughout the decision-making process, to transactions. Headquartered south of Charlotte, NC, Red Ventures employs thousands of people across the US and Puerto Rico, with international offices in the UK and Brazil. For more information, visit https:\u002F\u002Fredventures.com and follow @RedVentures on social platforms.\n\nWe offer competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits program for full-time employees, including medical, dental and vision coverage, paid time off, life insurance, disability coverage, employee assistance program, 401(k) plan and a paid parental leave program.\n\nRed Ventures is an equal opportunity employer that does not discriminate against any employee or applicant because of race, creed, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity\u002Fexpression, national origin, disability, age, genetic information, veteran status, marital status, pregnancy or any other basis protected by law. Employment at Red Ventures is based solely on a persons merit and qualifications.\n\nWe are committed to providing equal employment opportunities to qualified individuals with disabilities. We are not able to accept candidates who are currently on an OPT or STEM-OPT visa.<\u002Fi><\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <p> We are seeking a strong Product Lead to drive the development of MYMOVEs AI powered moving application.<\u002Fp> \n <p> The Product Lead will join the \"MyMove\" team within our Home division at Red Ventures. This role requires a hybrid schedule with 4 days in the office (Mon - Thu) and is based either in our New York or Charlotte office.<\u002Fp> \n <p><b> What Youll Do:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <ul> \n  <li>Work closely with senior leadership to develop the strategy for MYMOVE+, our AI powered moving application.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>We need a product and business leader to create and drive the product roadmap; provide vision and direction for the growth of the product<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Identify opportunities for new feature development and distribution, define and analyze KPIs to guide product development<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Work with cross-functional teams and external partners to drive product innovation and financial results<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Able to work in a fast paced environment, experience in 0-to-1 development, proven track record of iterating quickly<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Develop and guide a culture of talent development through both direct management of a product analyst and indirect cross-functional partnership<\u002Fli> \n <\u002Ful> \n <p><b>What Were Looking For:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <ul> \n  <li>4-5 years of previous experience in a product management role (preferably working on app development) with 1-2 years experience bringing generative AI technology and products to market<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Outstanding intellect, drive, and interpersonal skills and the desire to challenge the status quo<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Track record of developing product strategies that consider business goals, consumer needs, feasibility, time to market, unit economics, ROI and competition<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Proven proactive approach to product management, with strong follow-through, resourcefulness, attention to detail and excellent written and verbal communication skills<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Ability to thrive in a demanding, fast-paced environment requiring a high degree of productivity, adaptability, innovation and follow-through<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Demonstrated ability to influence cross-functional teams and guide them towards a unified product vision<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Passionate about understanding customer behavior and enhancing the product experience.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Strong level of accountability and ability to communicate across functional teams to drive priorities, anticipate pitfalls, and raise issues before they become project blockers<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Excellent organizational and communication skills.<\u002Fli> \n <\u002Ful> \n <p><b>Compensation<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <ul> \n  <li>USA Compensation Range: $100,000-$130,000<br> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Note actual salary is based on geographic location, qualifications, and experience.<\u002Fli>\n   <\u002Ful><\u002Fli> \n <\u002Ful> \n <p><i>Additionally, the following benefits are provided by Red Ventures, subject to eligibility requirements.<\u002Fi><\u002Fp> \n <ul> \n  <li>\n   <ul>\n    <li>Health Insurance Coverage (medical, dental, and vision)<\u002Fli> \n    <li>Life Insurance<\u002Fli> \n    <li>Short and Long-Term Disability Insurance<\u002Fli> \n    <li>Flexible Spending Accounts<\u002Fli> \n    <li>Paid Time Off<\u002Fli> \n <\u002Ful>\n <p><b>Who We Are:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <p> Founded in 2000, Red Ventures (RV) is home to a diverse portfolio of industry-leading brands and businesses, strategic partnerships and proprietary technology  including Bankrate, Lonely Planet, CNET, The Points Guy, BestColleges and more. Together, RV helps millions of people worldwide make lifes most important decisions, accelerates digital adaptation, and innovates the online consumer experience by improving every step of the consumer journey  from first discovery of information, throughout the decision-making process, to transactions. Headquartered south of Charlotte, NC, Red Ventures employs thousands of people across the US and Puerto Rico, with international offices in the UK and Brazil. For more information, visit https:\u002F\u002Fredventures.com and follow @RedVentures on social platforms.<\u002Fp> \n <p> We offer competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits program for full-time employees, including medical, dental and vision coverage, paid time off, life insurance, disability coverage, employee assistance program, 401(k) plan and a paid parental leave program.<\u002Fp> \n <p> Red Ventures is an equal opportunity employer that does not discriminate against any employee or applicant because of race, creed, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity\u002Fexpression, national origin, disability, age, genetic information, veteran status, marital status, pregnancy or any other basis protected by law. Employment at Red Ventures is based solely on a persons merit and qualifications.<\u002Fp> \n <p> We are committed to providing equal employment opportunities to qualified individuals with disabilities. This includes providing reasonable accommodation where appropriate. Should you require a reasonable accommodation to apply or participate in the job application or interview process, please contact accommodation@redventures.com.<\u002Fp> \n <p> If you are based in California, we encourage you to read this important information for California residents linked here.<\u002Fp>\n <div>\n  <p> Click here for more details regarding the employee privacy policy: https:\u002F\u002Fwww.redventures.com\u002Flegal\u002Fus-emp-privacy-notice <\u002Fp>\n  <p>Questions about this Privacy Notice can be directed to employeerights@redventures.com. We are not able to accept candidates who are currently on an OPT or STEM-OPT visa.<\u002Fi><\u002Fb><\u002Fp>\n <br> \n <p><\u002Fp> \n <p> We are seeking a strong Product Lead to drive the development of MYMOVEs AI powered moving application.<\u002Fp> \n <p> The Product Lead will join the \"MyMove\" team within our Home division at Red Ventures. This role requires a hybrid schedule with 4 days in the office (Mon - Thu) and is based either in our New York or Charlotte office.<\u002Fp> \n <p><b> What Youll Do:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <ul> \n  <li>Work closely with senior leadership to develop the strategy for MYMOVE+, our AI powered moving application.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>We need a product and business leader to create and drive the product roadmap; provide vision and direction for the growth of the product<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Identify opportunities for new feature development and distribution, define and analyze KPIs to guide product development<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Work with cross-functional teams and external partners to drive product innovation and financial results<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Able to work in a fast paced environment, experience in 0-to-1 development, proven track record of iterating quickly<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Develop and guide a culture of talent development through both direct management of a product analyst and indirect cross-functional partnership<\u002Fli> \n <\u002Ful> \n <p><b>What Were Looking For:<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <ul> \n  <li>4-5 years of previous experience in a product management role (preferably working on app development) with 1-2 years experience bringing generative AI technology and products to market<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Outstanding intellect, drive, and interpersonal skills and the desire to challenge the status quo<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Track record of developing product strategies that consider business goals, consumer needs, feasibility, time to market, unit economics, ROI and competition<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Proven proactive approach to product management, with strong follow-through, resourcefulness, attention to detail and excellent written and verbal communication skills<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Ability to thrive in a demanding, fast-paced environment requiring a high degree of productivity, adaptability, innovation and follow-through<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Demonstrated ability to influence cross-functional teams and guide them towards a unified product vision<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Passionate about understanding customer behavior and enhancing the product experience.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Strong level of accountability and ability to communicate across functional teams to drive priorities, anticipate pitfalls, and raise issues before they become project blockers<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Excellent organizational and communication skills.<\u002Fli> \n <\u002Ful> \n <p><b>Compensation<\u002Fb><\u002Fp> \n <ul> \n  <li>USA Compensation Range: Together, RV helps millions of people worldwide make lifes most important decisions, accelerates digital adaptation, and innovates the online consumer experience by improving every step of the consumer journey  from first discovery of information, throughout the decision-making process, to transactions. and competition<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Proven proactive approach to product management, with strong follow-through, resourcefulness, attention to detail and excellent written and verbal communication skills<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Ability to thrive in a demanding, fast-paced environment requiring a high degree of productivity, adaptability, innovation and follow-through<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Demonstrated experience.<\u002Fli> \n  <li>Strong level of accountability and ability to communicate across functional teams to drive priorities, anticipate pitfalls, and raise issues before they become project proprietary technology  including Bankrate, Lonely Planet, CNET, The Points Guy, BestColleges and more. Together, RV helps millions of people worldwide make lifes most important decisions, accelerates digital adaptation, and innovates the online consumer experience by improving every step of the consumer journey  from first discovery of information, throughout the decision-making process, to transactions. Headquartered south of Charlotte, NC, Red Ventures employs thousands of people across the US and Puerto Rico, with international offices in the UK and Brazil. Points Guy, BestColleges and more. Together, RV helps millions of people worldwide make lifes most important decisions, accelerates digital adaptation, and innovates the online consumer experience by improving every step of the consumer journey &ndash; from first discovery of information, throughout the decision-making process, to transactions.             window.signals_transport = window.signals_transport || { 
                emitSignal: function(data){

aria-orientation="horizontal" class="css-92hmla e15p7aqh1"><span class="css-1b6omqv esbq1260"><span>&amp;nbsp;</span></span></div></div><div id="benefits" data-testid="benefits-test" class="css-eynugf eu4oa1w0"><h2 id="benefitsSectionTitle" class="css-gfuqm7 e1tiznh50">Benefits<div class="css-1opnqdm e1wnkr790">Pulled from the full job description</div></h2><div class="css-1oelwk6 eu4oa1w0"><div class="css-k3ey05 eu4oa1w0"><span class="css-c62ar3 e1wnkr790"><ul class="css-8tnble eu4oa1w0"><li class="css-kyg8or eu4oa1w0">401(k)</li><li class="css-kyg8or eu4oa1w0">401(k) matching</li><li class="css-kyg8or eu4oa1w0">Dental insurance</li><li class="css-kyg8or eu4oa1w0">Disability insurance</li><li class="css-kyg8or eu4oa1w0">Employee assistance program</li><li class="css-kyg8or data-testid="collapsedBenefitsButton" class="css-ybnwnu e8ju0x51"><span class="css-1ysvuef e1wnkr790">Show more</span><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" focusable="false" role="img" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" aria-hidden="true" class=" css-v7l8ke eac13zx0"><title>chevron down</title><path d="M18.002 9.888c.2-.2.204-.521.008-.716l-.707-.708a.506.506 0 00-.716.01L12 13.06 7.413 8.474a.507.507 0 00-.716-.01l-.708.707a.507.507 0 00.01.717l5.647 5.648c.1.1.234.148.367.143a.491.491 0 00.34-.144h.001l.008-.008 5.64-5.64z"></path></svg></button><div role="separator" aria-orientation="horizontal" class="css-vms2hq e15p7aqh1"><span class="css-1b6omqv esbq1260"><span>&amp;nbsp;</span></span></div></div><div id="jobDescriptionTitle"><h2 tabindex="-1" id="jobDescriptionTitleHeading" class="css-wpzt8u e1tiznh50">Full job description</h2></div><div id="jobDescriptionText" class="jobsearch-JobComponent-description css-16y4thd eu4oa1w0"><div>
 <p><b><i>Please Note:</i></b><b><i> We are not able to provide Visa sponsorship for this role now or in the future. We are not able to accept candidates who are currently on an OPT or STEM-OPT visa.</i></b></p>
 <br> 
 <p></p> 
 <p> We are seeking a strong Product Lead to drive the development of MYMOVEs AI powered moving application.</p> 
 <p> The Product Lead will join the "MyMove" team within our Home division at Red Ventures. This role requires a hybrid schedule with 4 days in the office (Mon - Thu) and is based either in our New York or Charlotte office.</p> 
 <p><b> What Youll Do:</b></p> 
 <ul> 
  <li>Work closely with senior leadership to develop the strategy for MYMOVE+, our AI powered moving application.</li> 
  <li>We need a product and business leader to create and drive the product roadmap; provide vision and direction for the growth of the product</li> 
  <li>Identify opportunities for new feature development and distribution, define and analyze KPIs to guide product development</li> 
  <li>Work with cross-functional teams and external partners to drive product innovation and financial results</li> 
  <li>Able to work in a fast paced environment, experience in 0-to-1 development, proven track record of iterating quickly</li> 
  <li>Develop and guide a culture of talent development through both direct management of a product analyst and indirect cross-functional partnership</li> 
 </ul> 
 <p><b>What Were Looking For:</b></p> 
 <ul> 
  <li>4-5 years of previous experience in a product management role (preferably working on app development) with 1-2 years experience bringing generative AI technology and products to market</li> 
  <li>Outstanding intellect, drive, and interpersonal skills and the desire to challenge the status quo</li> 
  <li>Track record of developing product strategies that consider business goals, consumer needs, feasibility, time to market, unit economics, ROI and competition</li> 
  <li>Proven proactive approach to product management, with strong follow-through, resourcefulness, attention to detail and excellent written and verbal communication skills</li> 
  <li>Ability to thrive in a demanding, fast-paced environment requiring a high degree of productivity, adaptability, innovation and follow-through</li> 
  <li>Demonstrated ability to influence cross-functional teams and guide them towards a unified product vision</li> 
  <li>Passionate about understanding customer behavior and enhancing the product experience.</li> 
  <li>Strong level of accountability and ability to communicate across functional teams to drive priorities, anticipate pitfalls, and raise issues before they become project blockers</li> 
  <li>Excellent organizational and communication skills.</li> 
 </ul> 
 <p><b>Compensation</b></p> 
 <ul> 
  <li>USA Compensation Range: $100,000-$130,000<br> 
   <ul>
    <li>Note actual salary is based on geographic location, qualifications, and experience.</li>
   </ul></li> 
 </ul> 
 <p><i>Additionally, the following benefits are provided by Red Ventures, subject to eligibility requirements.</i></p> 
 <ul> 
  <li>
   <ul>
    <li>Health Insurance Coverage (medical, dental, and vision)</li> 
    <li>Life Insurance</li> 
    <li>Short and Long-Term Disability Insurance</li> 
    <li>Flexible Spending Accounts</li> 
    <li>Paid Time Off</li> 
    <li>Holiday Pay</li> 
    <li>401(k) with match</li> 
    <li>Employee Assistance Program</li> 
    <li>Paid Parental Bonding Benefit Program</li> 
   </ul> </li>
 </ul>
 <p><b>Who We Are:</b></p> 
 <p> Founded in 2000, Red Ventures (RV) is home to a diverse portfolio of industry-leading brands and businesses, strategic partnerships and proprietary technology  including Bankrate, Lonely Planet, CNET, The Points Guy, BestColleges and more. Together, RV helps millions of people worldwide make lifes most important decisions, accelerates digital adaptation, and innovates the online consumer experience by improving every step of the consumer journey  from first discovery of information, throughout the decision-making process, to transactions. Headquartered south of Charlotte, NC, Red Ventures employs thousands of people across the US and Puerto Rico, with international offices in the UK and Brazil. For more information, visit https://redventures.com and follow @RedVentures on social platforms.</p> 
 <p> We offer competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits program for full-time employees, including medical, dental and vision coverage, paid time off, life insurance, disability coverage, employee assistance program, 401(k) plan and a paid parental leave program.</p> 
 <p> Red Ventures is an equal opportunity employer that does not discriminate against any employee or applicant because of race, creed, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, national origin, disability, age, genetic information, veteran status, marital status, pregnancy or any other basis protected by law. Employment at Red Ventures is based solely on a persons merit and qualifications.</p> 
 <p> We are committed to providing equal employment opportunities to qualified individuals with disabilities. This includes providing reasonable accommodation where appropriate. Should you require a reasonable accommodation to apply or participate in the job application or interview process, please contact accommodation@redventures.com.</p> 
 <p> If you are based in California, we encourage you to read this important information for California residents linked here.</p>
 <div>
  <p> Click here for more details regarding the employee privacy policy: https://www.redventures.com/legal/us-emp-privacy-notice </p>
  <p>Questions about this Privacy Notice can be directed to employeerights@redventures.com. Alternatively, you may raise any questions or concerns to your manager, HR Business Partner, or through the Privacy Team.</p>
 </div>
